title: (x) Pimpjuice bling typeface - Shiraz {Kate McDonnell}
content:
Hi guys,

Does anyone know what typeface is this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084331im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/20074251344290_4954.pimp.juice.bling.logo.jpeg.jpg)

Also, I’m looking for similar “PIMP” styled typefaces ... if you guys know of anything that could work ... any hint will help! :)

Best,

Rodrigo

 [‹ (x) "Northwest Washington Board" blurry bubble block - Ondine {Florian, Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084331/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44101 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ackerman Realty Property Management script - Shelley Allegro {David H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084331/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44111 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rodrigogalindez
